descriptionHtml:
hello every one im skull 19971 and this is my mod number 10
 this is a verry simple mod add new 10 followers you can find them in bleack falls berrow see the pic
it add new 10 warriors the legendary warriors 5 girls and 5 mans and they are the best followers ever 5 use spells 5 use weapons and the boss of those 10 warriors one who use spells weapons and shouts with the name Dragulla yap he is the lord of vampires
1) Vegeta i think every one know him   2) Kakarod     3) Saizer
4) Lee Yung        5) StairGoth   6) Connors
7)  Aurub     8) Bulma        9) Luuba
10)Aladin i think every one know him     11) there boss Dragulla i think every one know him
Enjoy!!!!














For anyone who like to download my other 17 mods i assure you those mods are so cool
1) Ysgramor and talos followers : ysgramor and talos followers in whiterun http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18655

4) new difficulities : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18928

6) Robot kingdom quest : its a verry cool quest against giant robots like a boss http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19460
7) the doors of oblivion quest: you must close the doors of oblivion like your father did before in cyrodiil http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18950
8) new whiterun npc : some new npcs in whiterun but not a retx so i dident touch the essensiel ones  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18954
9) new npcs in the other cities windelhelm solitude ect... : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18954
10) Legendary warriors : 10 new strong followers http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23037
11) new basement in hjeriem : just a new basement in hjeriem but with a maze lets see what can you do to get out of the maze : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19073
12) Trainig house :  a great beautiful training house http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23038
13) college of soldiers: a college with many new quests http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19786
14) Godzella : cool godzella the lord of dinossors and you must kill him http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19074
15) Bomb Lazer Bomb tnt : a merchant sell you some bombs you can use it like a war game http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19072
16) kingdom of olds and children: a beautiful kingdom like whiterun and the others http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23039
17) Snow and fire kingdom : a beautiful kingdom like whiterun and the others http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23041
18) Giant kingdom: a beautiful kingdom like whiterun and the others : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23042
ENJOY!!! SKULL 19971
